name: Wrecked (itch) (Good Luck Collective)
description:
(If the web version doesn't work, switch to chrome)

A storm has broken up your ship! Your crew and pieces of your ship are scattered around the ocean. Use your harpoon to JOIN TOGETHER the wood scraps into a massive and powerful ship.

Be careful, though. Dangerous sea creatures and enemy pirate ships will try to kill you, so defend yourself with your cannons.

The goal of the game is to find the secret treasure. The map to find the treasure has also been torn into pieces and scattered around the ocean. Find all the pieces and JOIN them TOGETHER to win!

-----
